name: @tacc/texascale-cms
author: TACC COA CMD <coa-cmd@tacc.utexas.edu>
description: The TACC CMD custom assets used by Texaascale website.

scripts.build:dev: npm run build -- --quiet && npm run collectstatic
scripts.collectstatic: docker-compose exec cms python3 manage.py collectstatic --noinput --verbosity=1 2>&1 | grep -v 'Found another file'
